!SUBENTRY 2 org.eclipse.team.cvs.core 4 4 2007-06-29 17:52:32.508
!MESSAGE Location must have form ':methodname:[user[:password]@]host:[port]/path/to/cvsroot'
!SUBENTRY 2 org.eclipse.team.cvs.core 4 4 2007-06-29 17:52:32.508
!MESSAGE Only the following methods are supported: pserver, ext, extssh, pserverssh2

The exception you have included is being thrown because you are using an unsupported CVS connection method (cvsnt-sserver). This exception would not cause Eclipse to crash (i.e. crashes are usually either problems in the VM or in JNI calls like those used by SWT). While it is possible that the crash is related to the exception, it is impossible to tell without a trace of the crash. Please reopen if you can provide a trace of the crash. Also, it may be worthwhile to upgrade to the latest 3.2.x or even 3.3 to see if the crash still occurs.
